abstract: After Hong Kong loses Alibaba’s initial public offering, a survey shows that more than 90 percent of respondents oppose allowing partnership control structures like Alibaba’s in Hong Kong.
snippet: After Hong Kong loses Alibaba’s initial public offering, a survey shows that more than 90 percent of respondents oppose allowing partnership control structures like Alibaba’s in Hong Kong.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Hong Kong may have lost Alibaba’s giant initial public offering to the United States, but for some large investors in this Asian financial hub, that’s just fine.

headline.main: Hong Kong I.P.O. Structure Is Fine as Is, Investor Survey Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd
